items.text: Bouclier d'Athéna helped my family feel safe and supported. Their team was present at every step and made sure we had the resources we needed.

items.text: The support and guidance I received was life-changing. I couldn't have navigated this difficult time without their compassionate team.

items.text: Professional, caring, and always available. They truly go above and beyond to help those in need.

items.text: Their dedication to helping families is remarkable. I'm grateful for everything they've done for our community.

items.text: A beacon of hope during challenging times. Their services made all the difference for my family.

children_program.name: Children's Therapeutic Support Program
children_program.description: Your values align perfectly with our comprehensive program providing trauma-informed counseling, art therapy, and emotional support for children affected by domestic violence.
children_program.impactMetric: $150 provides 3 therapy sessions for one child
children_program.story: Through art therapy, I finally found a way to express feelings I couldn't put into words. Now I know I'm not alone, and it's okay to heal at my own pace.

housing_program.name: Emergency Family Housing & Stabilization
housing_program.description: This program offers safe emergency shelter, transitional apartments, and wrap-around support to help families rebuild their lives after violence.
housing_program.impactMetric: $250 funds 2 nights of safe emergency housing for a family
housing_program.story: Having a safe place to sleep gave us space to breathe. It was the first time in months that I saw my kids sleep peacefully.

legal_program.name: Legal & Court Support for Survivors
legal_program.description: We provide legal information, accompaniment to court, and advocacy so survivors are not alone when navigating complex legal systems.
legal_program.impactMetric: $100 supports one full day of legal accompaniment
legal_program.story: I was terrified of going to court. Having someone sit beside me, explain each step, and speak up when I couldn’t changed everything.
